title: North Country National Scenic Trail: Accessibility
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Accessibility             Accessibility         Wheelchair accessible portion of trail along the Sterling Marsh section of the trail in northern Michigan MLIve Grand Rapids Presshttp://www.mlive.com/grand-rapids/#/0  The North Country National Scenic Trail is over 4600 miles long with 2000 of those miles available for public use. Portions of the trail are more accessible than others. Some segments of the trail are too narrow for a wheelchair, others are wider and more accessible. For more information about accessibility along the particular segment of the trail that you wish to visit, contact the North Country Trail Association or one of the partners that helps manage the trail.
